name: Bright Day
description:
You awaken to a bright and sunny day. Wanting to go out and enjoy the beauty of the sun, you find that mysteriously, you can't leave. The doors are locked. No one is home. Strange noises can be heard behind your shoulder. Can you survive the nightmare slowly forming around you? Get lost in the Bombastus Apartments. Fight of wisps, dig deeper, and find a way out.

Bright Day is a fixed camera, survival horror game. Limited resources, a gun, and spooky sounds, is all you have.

You can email any bugs/issues/etc... at - riseoftheclack'n@yahoo.com
